hero.title: Boost your visibility and growth with high-performing digital strategies
hero.subtitle: Digital Marketing & Social Media
hero.description: Your digital presence is essential to capture attention, engage your audience, and convert. Numispark develops custom digital marketing strategies that generate concrete results for your business.

items.name: Social Media Strategy
items.description: We develop comprehensive and personalized social media strategies to achieve your business objectives and maximize your digital impact.
expertise: Audit of your current digital presence
items.conclusion: A well-thought-out social media strategy forms the foundation of your success on social platforms, aligning your daily actions with your long-term business objectives.

items.name: Social Media Content Creation
items.description: We design creative and relevant content that resonates with your audience and strengthens your brand identity on social media.
expertise: Creation of engaging posts for each platform
Graphic design adapted to social formats
Production of optimized photos and videos
items.conclusion: Our creative approach combines aesthetics, added value and technical optimization to maximize engagement and reach of your publications.

items.name: Community Management
items.description: We animate your communities daily to create a lasting relationship with your audience and transform your followers into ambassadors.
expertise: Regular publishing according to editorial calendar
Management of private messages and requests
items.conclusion: Our community management combines responsiveness, adapted tone and engagement strategy to build an active and loyal community around your brand.

items.name: Social Media Advertising (Social Ads)
items.description: We design and optimize targeted advertising campaigns on social media to achieve your acquisition, conversion and loyalty objectives.
items.conclusion: Our advertising campaigns are designed to maximize your return on investment through precise targeting and constant data-based optimization.

items.name: Social Media Analytics and Reporting
items.description: We deeply analyze the performance of your social media actions to continuously improve your strategy and demonstrate ROI.
expertise: Monitoring of relevant KPIs and metrics
items.conclusion: Our data-driven approach allows you to precisely understand the impact of your digital actions and adjust your strategy for ever better results.

items.name: Influencer Marketing
items.description: We design and deploy influence strategies to amplify your visibility and strengthen your credibility with new audiences.
expertise: Verification of metrics and real engagement
items.conclusion: Our collaborations with influencers are always aligned with your values and marketing objectives, creating authentic and measurable impact.

steps.title: Audit & Strategy
steps.description: We begin by analyzing your current situation and defining a personalized strategy. This phase includes analysis of your existing digital presence, study of your audience and personas, competitive benchmarking, SMART objectives definition, selection of priority platforms, content strategy development, and action and budget planning.

steps.title: Creation & Production
steps.description: We develop creative and high-performing content for each platform. This phase includes editorial calendar development, graphic template creation, photo and video production, key message and copy writing, advertising asset design, validation and adjustments, as well as content scheduling.

steps.title: Distribution & Animation
steps.description: We deploy and animate your presence on social media. This includes publishing according to the established schedule, daily community animation, responses to comments and messages, advertising campaign launches, real-time optimization, trend monitoring and reactivity, as well as interaction and community management.

steps.title: Analysis & Optimization
steps.description: We measure performance and continuously optimize. This phase includes daily tracking of key metrics, weekly performance analysis, optimization of ongoing campaigns, editorial schedule adjustments, A/B testing on different formats, detailed monthly reporting, and improvement recommendations.

steps.title: Evolution & Scaling
steps.description: We evolve your strategy to amplify results. This final phase includes in-depth quarterly analysis, identification of performing content, scaling of profitable campaigns, exploration of new platforms, global strategy adjustment, integration of new features, and future action planning.

whyUs.title: Why choose Numispark for your digital marketing

reasons.title: Multi-Platform Expertise
reasons.description: Our team masters the technical and strategic specificities of each social network, allowing you to deploy a consistent yet platform-adapted presence.

reasons.title: Results Focus
reasons.description: We don't just create attractive content, but design conversion-oriented strategies with measurable ROI, aligned with your business objectives.

reasons.title: Strategic Creativity
reasons.description: Our approach combines creativity and data-driven strategy to design content that stands out while generating concrete and measurable results.

reasons.title: Reactivity and Agility
reasons.description: Our structure allows us to be extremely reactive to opportunities, trends and algorithm changes, ensuring an always relevant digital presence.

reasons.title: Total Transparency
reasons.description: Our detailed reports and open communication allow you to clearly understand the impact of each action and the evolution of your digital presence.

budget.question: What budget should I plan for an effective social media strategy?
budget.answer: The cost entirely depends on your project scope. Our digital marketing services can range from a few hundred euros for basic management, up to 10,000 euros or more for complete multi-channel strategies with premium content production and large-scale advertising campaigns. We adapt our proposals to your budget and objectives, prioritizing high-impact actions.

timeline.question: How long does it take to see results on social media?
timeline.answer: Timelines vary according to your objectives and starting point. First results in terms of engagement can be visible from the first weeks, but real organic growth generally takes 3 to 6 months of constant work. Advertising campaigns can generate immediate results in terms of visibility and traffic. Our phased approach allows quick wins while building a solid long-term presence.

platforms.question: Which social platforms should my business be present on?
platforms.answer: Platform selection depends on your target audience, business sector and resources. Rather than being present everywhere superficially, we recommend concentrating your efforts on 2-3 strategic platforms where your audience is active. During our first consultation, we analyze your situation to recommend the most relevant social networks to achieve your objectives.

roi.question: How do you measure ROI of social media actions?
roi.answer: We define with you specific KPIs aligned with your business objectives: conversion, lead generation, qualified traffic, awareness, etc. We implement precise tracking via native platform analytics tools, Google Analytics and advanced tracking tools. Our monthly reports allow you to clearly visualize the impact of each action and the evolution of your social ROI.

expertise.question: Do you have specific sector expertise in digital marketing?
expertise.answer: Our team has developed expertise in several sectors: e-commerce and retail, B2B and professional services, training and education, health and wellness, real estate, tourism, and consumer products. This experience allows us to quickly understand the specifics of your market and adapt our strategies to the particularities of your sector.

collaboration.question: How is collaboration with Numispark organized for digital marketing?
collaboration.answer: After an initial kickoff to define objectives and strategy, we establish a fluid collaboration process: shared editorial calendar, content validation process, accessible performance dashboards, weekly progress meetings, and monthly results analysis meetings. Our collaborative approach involves you at each key stage while freeing you from daily management.

contentProduction.question: Do you produce photo and video content yourselves?
contentProduction.answer: Yes, our team includes graphic designers, photographers and videographers capable of producing quality visual content for your social media. According to your needs, we can organize regular photo/video shoots, create reusable graphic templates, or produce premium content for your important campaigns. We can also work with your existing teams or resources.

algorithms.question: How do you adapt your strategy to algorithm changes?
algorithms.answer: Our permanent monitoring of platform evolution allows us to anticipate and quickly adapt our strategies to algorithm changes. We never depend on a single tactic, favoring a diversified approach that remains effective despite evolutions. Our agility and technical expertise allow us to adjust our content and campaigns to constantly maintain and improve your performance.
